Name: monetary_cost
Desc: cost to public health budget This could also be cost per index case, cost per close contact, cost per interviewed case (to delineate the difference in cost when they were unsuccessful? re: HIV costing paper)

Name: hr_cost
Desc: Salary/benefit/etc cost

Name: hr_hours
Desc: Human hours

Name: staff_hired_count
Desc: Number of reported staff hired.  Type can be a count, per population or per (daily?) incidence.

Name: cases_assigned_[count|perc]
Desc: Initial set of possible cases assigned to org
Format: Integer, either number or percent value with no symbols

Name: contact_assigned_[count|perc]
Desc: Initial set of possible contacts assigned to org
Format: Integer, either number or percent value with no symbols

Name: cases_not_assigned_[count|perc]
Desc: Initial set of possible cases not assigned to org

Name: case_reached_[count|perc]
Desc: Org contacted index case, but did not complete interview

Name: case_interviewed_[count|perc]
Desc: Org completed index case interview. Percentage is of total cases assigned.

Name: case_named_contact_household_count
Desc: Number of cases who name at least one household contact.

Name: case_named_contact_count
Desc: Number of cases who name at least one contact.

Name: contacts_named_ratio_[type]_case_naming
Desc: The ratio of number of contacts named through case investigations over the number of cases interviewed that reported one or more contacts.  Means and medians are taken with respect to cases.

Name: contacts_named_ratio_[type]_household
Desc: The ratio of number of household contacts named through case investigations over the number of cases interviewed.  Means and medians are taken with respect to cases.

Name: contacts_named_ratio_[type]
Desc: The ratio of number of contacts named through case investigations over the number of cases interviewed.  Means and medians are taken with respect to cases.

Name: contacts_named_perc_household
Desc: 100 times the number of contacts named that are household contacts divided by overall number of contacts named

Name: contact_named_[count|perc]
Desc: Amount of contacts named by case or perc who reported contacts

Name: contact_named_count_household
Desc: Number of contacts named who live in the same household as the case naming them.

Name: contact_named_household_[count|perc]
Desc: Amount of household contacts named by case or perc who reported contacts

Name: contact_reached_[count|perc]
Desc: Org contacted secondary case, but did not complete interview

Name: contact_interviewed_[count|perc]
Desc: Org completed secondary case interview

Name: contact_test_pos_rate
Desc: The overall positivity rate among tested exposures (contacts)

Name: percent_naming_contacts
Desc: Percent of interviewed contacts that named any number of contacts

Name: case_named_contact_perc
Desc: Percent of interviewed contacts that named any number of contacts

Name: case_named_contact_household_perc
Desc: Percent of interviewed contacts that named any number of contacts

Name: contact_infected_[count|perc]
Desc: Secondary contact confirmed infected with covid

Name: case_reached_from_positive_[type]
Desc: Time from the health department getting the positive test result to getting in touch with primary case. type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: case_reached_from_test_[type]
Desc: Time from test (providing specimen) to getting in touch with primary case, type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: contact_reached_from_test_[type]
Desc: Time from test (providing specimen) to getting in touch with contact. Type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: case_test_from_symptom_[type]
Desc: Time from becoming symptomatic to  testing (providing specimen). Type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: case_positive_from_test_[type]
Desc: Time from providing specimen to getting in a positive result type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: case_reached_from_symptom_[type]
Desc: Time from symptom to getting in touch with primary case, type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: case_reached_from_exposure_[type]
Desc: Time from exposure to getting in touch with primary case, type can be added to specify med, mean, etc

Name: contact_reached_from_named_[type]
Desc: Time to reach contact after a case named them

Name: contact_reached_from_symptom_[type]
Desc: Time from case experiencing symptoms for the first time to reaching the contact

Name: contact_reached_from_positive_[type]
Desc: Time from health department receiving a positive test for the case to reaching the contact

Name: contact_reached_from_exposure_[type]
Desc: Time to reach contact after they were exposed

Name: num_users_[type]
Desc: Number of users for app at time period, type: min, max, avg, etc

Name: notifications_sent_[type]
Desc: Number of notifications sent from app at time period, type: min, max, avg, etc. Type can start with per_person or any other description that’s needed

Name: adoption_rate
Desc: Rate of adoption amongst whole population considered
Format: Float, percent value with no symbols

Name: deaths_prevented
Desc: Number of death prevented attributed to CI/CT or EN

Name: infections_prevented
Desc: Number of death prevented attributed to CI/CT or EN

Name: contact_tested_count
Desc: Number of contacts who eventually tested.

Name: case_test_to_result_mean
Desc: Time (in hours) from case testing to receiving the result

Name: contact_reached_from_case_pos_[type]
Desc: Time from case testing positive to contact receiving a notification

Name: cases_were_contacts_[count|perc]
Desc: Total # of Cases known as Contacts within the previous 14 Days

Name: users_with_code
Desc: Number of codes claimed by exposure notification app users.  This indicates users acknowledged in the app their positive status and began the process to share this information with others.

Name: self_report_codes_issued
Desc: The number of self reported codes  issued to users by the health department

Name: user_cases_notifying
Desc: Number of cases in which users uploaded keys to notify other app users of a potential exposure.

Name: notifications_recieved_total
Desc: Number of times contacts were notified.  Nearly identica to number of contacts notified or contacts reached.

Name: quarantine_adherent_perc
Desc: Percentage of inidividuals who didn't leave home for any nonmedical reason during isolation period

Name: hd_case_interviewed_perc
Desc: Mean % of Cases Completing an Interview across all health departments reporting the metrics.

Name: hd_percent_naming_contcts
Desc: Mean % of Cases that Provided at Least 1 Contact during Interview

Name: hd_contacts_named_ratio_mean
Desc: Mean # of Contacts Identified from Cases Completing an Interview

Name: hd_contacts_named_ratio_mean_case_naming
Desc: Mean # of Contacts Identified from Cases Providing Contacts

Name: hd_contact_reached_perc
Desc: Mean % of Contacts Identified who were Notified

Name: hd_contact_test_from_notified
Desc: Mean % of Contacts Notified who are Tested within 14 days

Name: hd_case_was_contact_perc
Desc: Mean % of Cases Reported to HD that were previously known as Contacts within the Past 14 Days

Name: hd_case_positive_from_test_mean
Desc: Mean # of reported hours between specimen collection and report of case to health department

Name: hd_case_reached_from_positive_mean
Desc: Mean # of reported hours between the report of case to health department and case interview completion

Name: hd_case_reached_from_test_mean
Desc: Mean # of reported hours between the specimen collection and case interview completion

Name: hd_contact_reached_from_named_mean
Desc: Mean # of reported hours between case interview completion and contact notification.

Name: staff_hired_ci_count
Desc: Number of staff hired to conduct case investigations

Name: staff_hired_ct_count
Desc: Number of staff hired to conduct contact tracing

Name: staff_hired_ci_per_health_dept_mean
Desc: The mean number of case investigators hired across reporting health departments

Name: staff_hired_ct_per_health_dept_mean
Desc: The mean number of contact tracers hired across reporting health departments

Name: cases_per_staff_month
Desc: The number of cases divided by the number of case investigators across all health departments

Name: contacts_per_staff_month
Desc: The number of contacts divided by the number of contact tracers across all health departments
